Vps_DispBufPrgmCbFxnParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Display API

Display buffer program callback parameter structure. More...

#include <vps_display.h>

Data Fields

Vps_DispBufPrgmCbFxn bufPrgmCbFxn
 

Detailed Description

Display buffer program callback parameter structure.

Field Documentation

Vps_DispBufPrgmCbFxn Vps_DispBufPrgmCbFxnParams::bufPrgmCbFxn

[IN] Application callback function to be called just before programming the hardware. A value of NULL will un register the callback.
